definition: variant of 唯利是圖|唯利是图[wei2 li4 shi4 tu2]
-ism/only
surname Li
sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: virtue flies from the heart of a mercenary man.
sentences.chinese: 惟利是图者，胸中无美好的品德。

sentences.english: B:Because the food manufactures are so obsessed with making money that they lose the business ethics.
sentences.chinese: 因为食品生产者惟利是图，丧失了商业道德。

sentences.english: A:Because the food manufactures are so obsessed with making money that they lose the business ethics.
sentences.chinese: 因为食品生产者惟利是图，丧失了商业道德。

sentences.english: It is invidious profiteering those hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 那些医院简直就是惟利是图。

definition: to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
to see profit and forget morality (idiom); to act from mercenary considerations/to sell one's soul for gain
blinded by greed (idiom)
to value material gain over righteousness
to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
unscrupulous businessperson/profiteer/philistine
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
to be greedy in getting money
all businessmen are evil (idiom)
unscrupulous businessman/profiteer/shark/dishonest business
to be shortsighted
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
to put money above everything else
snob
snobbish
